content: श्रावण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [श्रवण-अण्] {@--1@} Relating to the ear. {@--2@} Born under the asterism Śravaṇa. --णः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a lunar month; (corresponding to July-August). {@--2@} A heretic. {@--3@} An impostor. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Vaiśya ascetic unwittingly shot dead by king Daśaratha who was in consequence cursed by his old parents that he would die of broken-heart separated from his sons. --णं {@--1@} Causing to be heard. {@--2@} Knowledge derived from hearing.
श्रावणी {@--1@} The day of full moon in Śrāvaṇa. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of an annual ceremony performed on this day when the sacred thread is put on anew.
